rules.name: Odd route flight level
rules.condition: dep == 'EDDS' and sidwpt in ['DKB', 'ABTAL', 'KUNOD', 'SUL', 'TEDGO', 'STG'] and rfl % 2000 == 0

rules.name: Even route flight level
rules.condition: dep == 'EDDS' and sidwpt in ['KRH', 'VESID', 'TAGIK', 'ETASA', 'OKIBA', 'GEBNO'] and rfl % 2000 != 0

rules.name: KRH destination
rules.condition: dep == 'EDDS' and sidwpt == 'KRH' and !(arr == 'EDDR' or arr == 'EDRZ' or arr == 'EDSB' or arr == 'ETAR')

rules.name: TAGIK route restrictions
rules.condition: dep == 'EDDS' and sidwpt == 'TAGIK' and !('ABUMO' or 'ASKIK' in route)

rules.name: ETASA destination
rules.condition: dep == 'EDDS' and sidwpt == 'ETASA' and !(arr == 'EDDF' or arr == 'EDFC' or arr == 'EDFE' or arr == 'ETOU')

rules.name: GEBNO route restrictions
rules.condition: dep == 'EDDS' and sidwpt == 'GEBNO' and !('GEBNO Z76' in route)
